column2:
"Too many young members these days are neglecting to
upgrade their weapon elements. We shouldn't
let them slack off like that, if you ask me."

"If you fuse the weapons you've worked so hard to
obtain, you can get a completely new one--one that
can be your most trusted partner in the world."

"What about you? Maybe you ought to go do some
upgrades while we're on the subject."

"Upgrade what? Your weapon elements! Haven't
you been listening? You'd best pay attention.
Now go use your synthesizer at the Item Lab."

"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket
science. Now go put my mind at ease by making
some upgrades, all right?"

"You can upgrade weapon elements at the Item Lab. Upgrading
allows you to boost a weapon's elemental attributes. "

"You need the following to upgrade elements:
- Meseta
- A Synthesizer
- A component weapon

You can upgrade the effect of weapon elements such as fire or ice.
Using a component weapon with the same attribute as the one
you are upgrading raises its attribute value."
